page.title: 10GAZETTEER
page.content: { }WICKWAR IS SITUATED NEAR THE BOARDER OF AVON AND GLOUCESTERSHIRE, BUT IS IN AVON.THE POSTAL ADDRESS IS GLOUCESTERSHIRE.WICKWAR IS 13 MILES AWAY FROM BRISTOL AND 15 MILES AWAY FROM THE RIVER SEVERN.WICKWAR IS QUITE CLOSE TO THE M4 AND M5,WHICH ARE MOTOR WAYS.OUR CLOSEST VILLAGES ARE KINGSWOO D AND RANGEWORTHY.ABOUT 6\ MILES AWAY ARE THE COTSWOLD HILLS.WICKWAR IS MAIN LY FLAT.THERE ARE QUITE A LOT OF QUARR YIES AROUND WICKWAR THIS CAUSES A LOT OF LORRIES TO PASS THROUGH THE VILLAGE.IN WICKWAR THE POPULATION IS ABOUT{1,200.}WICKWAR HAS THE OLDEST WORKING CLOCK IN BRITAIN.IN 1984 THE WICKWAR SCHOOL CELEBRATED ITS TRICENTENNIAL ANNIVERSARY,A PLAQUE WAS PLACED ON THE SIDE OF THE SCHOOL,AND A WEEK LONG CELEBRATION WAS HELD TO MARK THE EVENT.THE EVENT WAS RECORDED. { }
